text: Nikhil Nandy (1932 – 29 December 2020) was an Indian footballer. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1956 Summer Olympics. He played for the national team. He was born in Kolkata, India. Nandy died on 29 December 2020 in Nagerbazar, India at the age of 88.পি কে, চুনীর পর এ বার চলে গেলেন নিখিল নন্দীও ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian footballers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in India Category:Olympians for India
title: Nikhil Nandy
